attributes.background: I submitted the "Revoke Article 50 and give the English an independence referendum" petition on 25/7/2019. Petitions are supposedly approved in less than a week. Why am I still waiting 30 days (at time of writing) later. Is this political?

rejection.details:
We try to check petitions within seven days. But, sometimes, this can take longer - for example, if we've received a lot more petitions than usual (so it takes us longer to check them all) or if we have to speak with our colleagues about a complex issue.

Since this petition was submitted your original petition has been moderated.
